Package Description
com.shaft.gui.element  

  • Uses of TouchActions in com.shaft.gui.element

    Methods in com.shaft.gui.element that return TouchActions
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TouchActions TouchActions.doubleTap​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
    Double-Taps an element on a touch-enabled screen
    TouchActions TouchActions.longTap​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
    Performs a long-tap on an element to trigger the context menu on a touch-enabled screen
    TouchActions TouchActions.nativeKeyboardKeyPress​(TouchActions.KeyboardKeys key)
    Sends a keypress via the device keyboard.
    TouchActions ElementActions.performTouchAction()
    This is a convenience method to be able to call TouchActions Actions for touch-enabled devices from within the regular Element Actions Class.
    static TouchActions ElementActions.performTouchAction​(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
    This is a convenience method to be able to call TouchActions Actions for touch-enabled devices from within the regular Element Actions Class.
    TouchActions TouchActions.swipeByOffset​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, int xOffset, int yOffset)
    Swipes an element with the desired x and y offset.
    TouchActions TouchActions.swipeElementIntoView​(org.openqa.selenium.By targetElementLocator, TouchActions.SwipeDirection swipeDirection)
    Attempts to scroll the element into view in case of native mobile elements.
    TouchActions TouchActions.swipeElementIntoView​(org.openqa.selenium.By targetElementLocator, TouchActions.SwipeDirection swipeDirection, TouchActions.SwipeTechnique swipeTechnique)
    Attempts to scroll the element into view in case of native mobile elements.
    TouchActions TouchActions.swipeElementIntoView​(org.openqa.selenium.By targetElementLocator, TouchActions.SwipeDirection swipeDirection, TouchActions.SwipeTechnique swipeTechnique, int scrollableElementInstanceNumber)
    Attempts to scroll the element into view in case of native mobile elements.
    TouchActions TouchActions.swipeToElement​(org.openqa.selenium.By sourceElementLocator, org.openqa.selenium.By destinationElementLocator)
    Swipes the sourceElement onto the destinationElement on a touch-enabled screen
    TouchActions TouchActions.tap​(java.lang.String elementReferenceScreenshot)
    Taps an element once on a touch-enabled screen
    TouchActions TouchActions.tap​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
